name: ftlabs-screens-viewer
description: Connects to a screens server with websockets and fires events on url change.

scripts.test: npm run build; npm run build-test; mocha-phantomjs ./test/test.html --ignore-ssl-errors=true
scripts.deploy: npm run build; git diff --quiet HEAD || exit 1; PKG_VERSION=`npm version --no-git-tag-version ${1-'patch'} | cut -c 2-`; cd build/; npm version --no-git-tag-version $PKG_VERSION; cd -; git commit -am v$PKG_VERSION; git-directory-deploy --directory build --branch production; git checkout production; git tag v$PKG_VERSION; git push --tags; git checkout -
